div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 197 Greece, 1937 (103) Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: c. 200 AE Aetolia (a few) Athens Elis Disposition: unknown Information from Athenian correspondent (no further details) Noe gives the findspot as Athens but this is only where the coins were seen
